00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_K_HEAP_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_K_HEAP_H_
00029 
00030 // Include the std::less predicate (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00033 // Include indirect heaps and traits information.
00034 #include "indirect_heap.h"
00035 #include "traits.h"
00036 
00037 namespace kche_tree {
00038 
00048 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
00049 class KHeap {
00050 public:
00051 
00052   // Constructors and destructors.
00053   KHeap(unsigned int k); 
00054   KHeap(const KHeap &heap); 
00055   ~KHeap(); 
00056 
00057   // Assignment operator.
00058   KHeap &operator =(const KHeap &heap); 
00059 
00060   // Comparison operator.
00061   bool operator ==(const KHeap &heap) const; 
00062 
00063   // Heap operations.
00064   bool push(const T &elem); 
00065   void pop_best(); 
00066   void pop_worst(); 
00067 
00068   // Heap properties.
00069   bool full() const; 
00070   bool empty() const; 
00071   unsigned int size() const; 
00072 
00073   const T &best() const; 
00074   const T &worst() const; 
00075 
00076   unsigned int get_K() const; 
00077   unsigned int count() const; 
00078 
00079 
00080   // STL-based names for heap operations and properties.
00081   bool push_front(const T &elem) { return push(elem); } 
00082   bool push_back (const T &elem) { return push(elem); } 
00083 
00084   void pop_front() { pop_worst(); } 
00085   void pop_back()  { pop_best(); } 
00086 
00087   const T &front() const { return worst();  } 
00088   const T &back()  const { return best(); } 
00089 
00090 
00091 protected:
00092   unsigned int K; 
00093   T *data; 
00094 
00095   const Compare &compare; 
00096   static const idx root = 1; 
00097 
00098   IndirectHeap<T, Compare, idx> bestHeap; 
00099   IndirectHeap<T, std::binary_negate<Compare>, idx> worstHeap; 
00100 };
00101 
00102 } // namespace kche_tree
00103 
00104 // Template implementation.
00105 #include "k-heap.tpp"
00106 
00107 #endif
